name: Agent In Depth (itch)
description:
You are a combat specialist who works in an underground science company. When you were in Hawaii for your holiday, you receive a message from your scientist friends. Bad news! Your friends have been trapped in one of the levels of the underground facility and the turrets that once meant to protect the facility become hostile to everyone. You need to get back from your sweet holiday by your special jet and save the science team! To save them, you need to go deeper in the underground facility and clear the levels from hostile turrets by reflecting their bullets with your sword.

Yigit Doruk - Developer, Game Designer

Semih Sevimli - Developer, Game Designer

Mustafa Ahmet Ozdemir - Developer

Fatih Gorguc - Animation, Graphical Design

Martín Bâtard - Composer, Sound Design

Ahmet Tarik Durmaz - Storytelling

Ömer Faruk Kalkınç - Social Support
